T02TD2668E:178a-1: bha ga w'am manydzu shr'i gho sha sya kro dha ya m'anta ka ho ma bi dhi:/
T02TD2668E:178a-3: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga / byang chub sems dpal 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2668E:178a-4: de la du ma dang rdzas so sor bya ba ni sbyir gsal lo //
T02TD2668E:178a-5: de la zhi ba la ni thab khung zlum po rgyar khru gang la zabs su de'i phyed par byas te /
T02TD2668E:178a-7: rgyas pa la de'i nyis 'gyur du bya ste /
T02TD2668E:178a-8: dbyibs gru bzhi ser por bya'o //
T02TD2668E:178a-9: de gnyis kyi mu ran yang zhi ba la sor bzhi'i 'phang la rgyas pa la nyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD2668E:178a-10: dbang dang drag po'i sor bcu'i rgya dang lnga'i zabs su bya'o //
T02TD2668E:178a-11: kha khyer dang mu ran ni 'phang du sor gsum du mtshungs so //
T02TD2668E:178a-12: kha dog dmar nag dang sngon po la dbyibs ni zla ba phyed pa dang /
T02TD2668E:178a-14: thams cad kyi nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad ba lte bser por bya'o //
T02TD2668E:178a-15: lte bar yi dags 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2668E:178a-16: 'dab ma dmar po la mtshams kyi bzhir be con no //
T02TD2668E:178a-17: kha khyer la zhi ba la 'khor lo //
T02TD2668E:178a-18: rgyas pa la ni rin chen /
T02TD2668E:178a-20: drag po la rtse gsum mo //
T02TD2668E:178a-21: mu ran la yi dags phreng bar mtshungs so //
T02TD2668E:178a-22: de'i phyi rol gru bzhi sgo bzhir /
T02TD2668E:178a-23: yi dags so so bar sbrel te /
T02TD2668E:178a-25: thab khung brtsegs nas nang ku sha rtse mo yang phyogs so so bar bstan la bud shing so so bas bris pa'i dbyibs bzhin brtsig go //
T02TD2668E:178a-26: de nas rdzas so so ba yang g-yas su gzhag par bya //
T02TD2668E:178a-27: mchod pa so so g-yon du gzhag / mdun du mar so so ba dang /
T02TD2668E:178a-28: yon chu dang gzar bu rnam gzhag go //
T02TD2668E:178a-29: de nas sngags pas gos so so ba gon te //
T02TD2668E:178a-31: stan so so ba la kha yang zhi bshar /
T02TD2668E:178a-34: drag po byang du bltas te /
T02TD2668E:178a-35: sgrub thabs kyi gzhung la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2668E:178a-36: bstod pa yan chad rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD2668E:178a-37: lha gtang ba'i cho ga bya ste /
T02TD2668E:178b-0: las dang mthun pa'i me bus la spar @178b te /
T02TD2668E:178b-1: rgyun gyi me'am rgyu las brtag / dngul phor rgyu yi snod kyis bla //
T02TD2668E:178b-2: gser snod dge zhing bkra shis par //
T02TD2668E:178b-3: rgyal rigs me'am rgyu las brtag / rje'i rigs smad 'tshong rgyu las brtag / zangs sogs dbang la blang bar bya //
T02TD2668E:178b-4: gdol ba'i me'am dur khrod me //
T02TD2668E:178b-5: lcags dang thod par blang bar bya //
T02TD2668E:178b-6: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bsang ba dang //
T02TD2668E:178b-7: yi dags bkod nas mtshon chas bsrungs //
T02TD2668E:178b-8: dkar po lo ma'i shing bzang la //
T02TD2668E:178b-9: mtho gang tshad du mnyam byas pa'i //
T02TD2668E:178b-10: yam sreg shing des zhi ba spar //
T02TD2668E:178b-11: au du ma b'a ra byang chub shing //
T02TD2668E:178b-12: nyis 'gyur gyis ni rgyas par spar //
T02TD2668E:178b-13: mya ngan med stsogs seng ldeng bzang //
T02TD2668E:178b-14: sor gsum tshad du dbang drag mtshungs //
T02TD2668E:178b-15: drag po dur khrod tsher ma yi //
T02TD2668E:178b-16: ya ma sreg shing bu mar spar bya //
T02TD2668E:178b-17: de yang rlung ring phyogs bltas te /
T02TD2668E:178b-20: ram dzva la ram zhes rlung yab dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2668E:178b-21: de nas me de bsangs la /
T02TD2668E:178b-22: bdag dam tshig sems dpa'i skur bskyed pa 'jig rten pa nyid du bya'o //
T02TD2668E:178b-23: de nas me'i dbus su pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar la nyi ma /
T02TD2668E:178b-25: zhi rgyas la nyi mar bsam mo //
T02TD2668E:178b-26: de nas mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyal mthe bong gis srin lag la mnan te /
T02TD2668E:178b-27: ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi ta /
T02TD2668E:178b-28: aagna ye b'a ba ka / a'a ga tstsha a'a ga tstsha /
T02TD2668E:178b-29: zhes pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo //
T02TD2668E:178b-31: aom h'um dzi na dzig / zhes gtor ro //
T02TD2668E:178b-34: p'a pa ka ma h'a pra te dza sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:178b-36: aagna ye ma h'a te dza /
T02TD2668E:178b-37: sarbba k'a ma s'a dha na /
T02TD2668E:178b-38: sa tva aartha a'a di ti ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:178b-39: me tog thab tu gtor te gdan bshams pa la bzhugs bar brtag go //
T02TD2668E:178b-40: de nas mar la gzar bu lan bdun nam gsum du dbul lo //
T02TD2668E:178b-41: na ma ssa manta buddha aa gna ye p'a pa ka ram ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:178b-42: de bzhin du rgyas pa la ni ma he na tra zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2668E:178b-43: dbang la ni ma ma ra zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2668E:178b-44: drag po la ni kro dha ni zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2668E:178b-45: de ltar me 'bar ba'i dgang blugs phul te /
T02TD2668E:178b-46: me 'bar ba dang ku sha dgram ste /
T02TD2668E:178b-50: drag po la byang nas dgram par bya'o //
T02TD2668E:178b-51: zhi rgyas rtsa ba dang bcas te byas /
T02TD2668E:179a-0: @179a * // dbang drag phyed mar gtub pa'i rtse mos bskor ro //
T02TD2668E:179a-1: aom ai me ka sha / shu pa dib bya /
T02TD2668E:179a-7: gar pa bha gar pa bha bandu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-8: de nas phur pa bzhi yang sgo bzhir gzugs //
T02TD2668E:179a-9: mda' bzhi yang gra bzhir btsugs la /
T02TD2668E:179a-10: tshon skud bre zhing bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod do //
T02TD2668E:179a-11: des ni bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2668E:179a-12: de nas mchod pa so so ba dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2668E:179a-13: de nas sngar yam sreg shing gi tshad gyi rigs kyi yam shing dbul lo //
T02TD2668E:179a-14: zhi ba la mar dkar po //
T02TD2668E:179a-15: rgyas pa la mar ser po //
T02TD2668E:179a-17: drag po la mi tshil bzhu ba'am tsha ba'i mar ro //
T02TD2668E:179a-32: shing thog la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2668E:179a-33: sngags gcig gam so so yang rung ste 'bul lo //
T02TD2668E:179a-35: aom aagna ye p'a pam sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-40: badzra ya dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-44: sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-46: sarbba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-48: aa pra ti ha ta badzr'a aa sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-50: badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-52: ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-54: badzra ghasma r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-56: badzra bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-58: ma h'a ba l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-62: ma h'a shri pa ya ba ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179a-66: shing thog btogs te zhal nyid du dbul te /
T02TD2668E:179a-67: dang por aom dang tha mar sv'a h'a bzhag ste mchod /
T02TD2668E:179a-69: de nas 'bar ba'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsgom mo //
T02TD2668E:179a-70: 'jig rten pa'i me lha mchod pa'i rim pa dang po'o //
T02TD2668E:179a-71: phyogs skyong la mchod na yang de'i snying gar rdzogs par bkod la bsang gtor dang /
T02TD2668E:179a-73: de nas mchod pa lngas mchod de /
T02TD2668E:179b-0: de nas @179b yam shing nas mar dang rim pa bzhin mchod do //
T02TD2668E:179b-1: tha mar mar gyis mchod de /
T02TD2668E:179b-2: ai nadra ye la sogs pas mchod do //
T02TD2668E:179b-8: aom kro dha bi ra bi ra sa ma ye /
T02TD2668E:179b-9: a'a gad dza a'a gad dza /
T02TD2668E:179b-10: aom a'a: h'um ai dam pre to a'a sa nam kri pra pre todka te ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179b-11: aom a'a: h'um zhes sku bsang ngo //
T02TD2668E:179b-12: aom aee ka bi ya m'anta ka bi sa ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179b-14: na massarbba ta th'a ga te bhya: pre ta mu ka kha da kha da sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179b-15: gdan phul la thab tu bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2668E:179b-16: de nas mar gyi dgang blugs dbul lo //
T02TD2668E:179b-17: de nas mchod pa lnga dbul lo //
T02TD2668E:179b-20: de bzhin du shing thog yan chad dbul lo //
T02TD2668E:179b-21: aom aa kro te ka ya m'anta ka ha na ma tha bhanydza h'um phat /
T02TD2668E:179b-24: sv'a h'a pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2668E:179b-26: ho ba sham ku ru ho //
T02TD2668E:179b-30: sngags de gcig pus dbul lo //
T02TD2668E:179b-31: sngags rang gi so so ba yang rung ngo //
T02TD2668E:179b-32: tha mar yang mar gyi dgang blugs dbul lo //
T02TD2668E:179b-33: de nas mchod pa lnga dang bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD2668E:179b-34: dngos grub gsol la gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2668E:179b-38: de nas yang 'jig rten pa'i sngon bzhin du bsams la sngon bzhin rdzas lhag mchod do //
T02TD2668E:179b-39: tha mar mar gyi dgang blugs la las bskul zhing lan mang du dbul lo //
T02TD2668E:179b-40: de nas mchod pa lngas mchod do //
T02TD2668E:179b-41: bstod pa yang brjod la de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab nas bsang gtor byas nas zhal bsil la /
T02TD2668E:179b-45: rgyas pa'i thab khung du d'ur ba'i sngags kyis d'ur ba'i mar la bsnyug cing lan grangs mang du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2668E:179b-47: de la sogs pa rtog pa dgu pa nas 'byung ba'i tshul du gang 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg rdzas gang shis pas bya'o //
T02TD2668E:179b-48: de la gsad par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rjes dang /
T02TD2668E:180a-0: dur khrod gyi sol ba la gzugs byas te snying gar ming rus bcug nas sgrub thabs kyi mjug tu @180a * //
T02TD2668E:180a-1: dgra bo bkug la ling ga la gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2668E:180a-4: tsha bas rjes su bsrel la /
T02TD2668E:180a-5: yungs mar gyis kyang bsgos nas yam shing dang /
T02TD2668E:180a-6: mar gyi steng la bsreg go //
T02TD2668E:180a-7: bskrad par 'dod na bya rog gi shes bya'o //
T02TD2668E:180a-8: dbye bar 'dod na bya rog dang /
T02TD2668E:180a-10: de la stsogs pa las dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2668E:180a-13: de la sogs pa sbyir shes par bya'o //
T02TD2668E:180a-14: zhi ba la dam tshig dang ye shes kyi me lha dkar po'o //
T02TD2668E:180a-17: drag po la sngon por bsgom mo //
T02TD2668E:180a-21: bsam pa yang zhi ba ni byams pa'o //
T02TD2668E:180a-22: rgyas pa ni rgyas par bya ba'i sems sam /
T02TD2668E:180a-24: dbang la ni dga' chags sam zhe na pas 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2668E:180a-25: drag po la ni ma rangs pa dang /
T02TD2668E:180a-26: yid skyo ba dang khro sems so //
T02TD2668E:180a-27: las ni zhi ba la ni 'od zer dkar po 'phros pas de dag gis gang la bya ba'i nad dang /
T02TD2668E:180a-28: sdug bsngal la stsogs pa drangs shing bsdus nas rgya mtsho chen por dor bar bsam mo //
T02TD2668E:180a-29: rgyas pa la 'od zer ser po 'phro ba de dag gang gi lus la zhugs pa de nyid kyis dpal la sogs pa de dag rgyas par bsam mo //
T02TD2668E:180a-30: dbang la 'od zer de dag dmar por 'phros te gang dbang du bya ba'i lus sems kyi rgyud bkang zhing nyams shing myos pa de dag drangs nas rkang pa'i drung du ltung ste skya bas su dong bar bsam mo //
T02TD2668E:180a-31: drag po la 'od zer sngo nag dug ha la ha la ltar mkhregs shing dngos po shin tu sra ba dag kyang reg pa tsam gyis thal ba'i mthar byed pa 'phros nas /
T02TD2668E:180a-32: gang la bya ba la khyab par gyur te /
T02TD2668E:180a-33: skad cig tsam gyis thul gyis bsregs te thal bar gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2668E:180a-34: yon chu yang zhi ba la 'o ma'i nang du mngar gsum dang me tog dkar po'o //
T02TD2668E:180a-36: drag po la chang dang skyur ba'i khu ba dang tsha ba rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2668E:180a-37: bsang gtor ni chu gtsang ma dang /
T02TD2668E:180a-39: dri bzang por sbyar la me tog so so ba'i kha dog bcug pas bya'o //
T02TD2668E:180b-0: me'i @180b kha dog gi yi ge dgod pa yang ram dkar po dang /
T02TD2668E:180b-4: dgang gzar blugs gzar la yang chos kyi yi ge 'bru /
T02TD2668E:180b-5: aom sv'a a'a: h'um rnams kha dog so sor dgod do //
T02TD2668E:180b-6: rgyu yang so so la bya'o //
T02TD2668E:180b-7: me lha'i rtsa ba'i lha'i sku ni dmar ser ro //
T02TD2668E:180b-8: zhi ba'i dus su p'a pam ka dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
T02TD2668E:180b-10: gnyis pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya /
T02TD2668E:180b-14: rgyas pa la ser po phyag gnyis ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2668E:180b-15: dbang la 'dod pa'i me tog dmar po zhes bya ba g-yas dang po na lcags kyu gnyis pa na zhags pa'o //
T02TD2668E:180b-16: bsad pa la rlung zhes bya ba sngon po //
T02TD2668E:180b-19: dam tshig gi me lha nyid de ltar bskyed do //
T02TD2668E:180b-20: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skabs su khro bo ya m'a nta ka de nyid zhi ba la dkar po //
T02TD2668E:180b-21: phyag dang po gnyis bum pa dkar po nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dkar po gtong ba'o //
T02TD2668E:180b-22: rgyas pa la bum pa ser po nas chu rgyun ser po //
T02TD2668E:180b-23: dbang la dang po skyo zhags /
T02TD2668E:180b-24: drag po la rtsal ba nyid bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2668E:180b-25: yam shing dang sreg shing yang rgyu dang tshad gcig par bya'o //
T02TD2668E:180b-26: de ni cho ga snga ma'i thun du bstan pa'o //
T02TD2668E:180b-27: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sbrul pa yi //
T02TD2668E:180b-28: khro bo gtso bo de kho na //
T02TD2668E:180b-29: yi dags phal chen dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2668E:180b-30: rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyod byin nas //
T02TD2668E:180b-31: gtsang ba'i gnas su nyer 'dug nas //
T02TD2668E:180b-32: dang po'i bsnyen pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD2668E:180b-33: thun bzhi'i dus su bzlas pa dang //
T02TD2668E:180b-34: mchod pa'i cho ga dag byas shing //
T02TD2668E:180b-35: byang chub sems dang ldan pa yis /
T02TD2668E:180b-36: d/'bum drug tshad du bzlas pa bya //
T02TD2668E:180b-37: de nas bu don cho ga yis //
T02TD2668E:180b-38: sku gzugs legs par bsgrubs nas kyang //
T02TD2668E:180b-39: rab tu gnas pa'i las byas nas //
T02TD2668E:180b-40: de yi sbyan sngar sum 'bum bzlas //
T02TD2668E:180b-41: de nas smyung dang ldan pa yis//
T02TD2668E:180b-42: ri yi rtse mor 'bum gcig bzlas //
T02TD2668E:180b-43: dngos grub 'bring gi bsnyen par bshad //
T02TD2668E:180b-44: rgyal srid la sogs dngos grub 'bring //
T02TD2668E:180b-45: de nas sngags pas nags tshal song //
T02TD2668E:180b-46: ri khar gnas rnyed snyoms 'jug sbyod //
T02TD2668E:180b-47: seng ldeng dbyug pa 'dom gang tsam //
T02TD2668E:180b-48: 'phan med pa ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2668E:181a-0: @181a * // rkang pas bgrod dka' bgrod pa dang //
T02TD2668E:181a-1: rgyal po la sogs phyag mi byed //
T02TD2668E:181a-2: khro bo'i rnal 'byor nga rgyal ches //
T02TD2668E:181a-5: sngags kyi don ni bcu bdun po //
T02TD2668E:181a-6: lha dang mi phyed rtag bzlas pa //
T02TD2668E:181a-7: thun bzhir sngon bzhin mchod pa dang //
T02TD2668E:181a-8: bsnyen pa'i tshul du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2668E:181a-9: dngos grub mchog rnams thob 'dod na //
T02TD2668E:181a-10: sngags pas de ltar brtul zhugs sbyod //
T02TD2668E:181a-11: byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas //
T02TD2668E:181a-12: gtsang sbra smyung ba dbang po bsdams //
T02TD2668E:181a-13: brtags pa'i zas la rol bya'o //
T02TD2668E:181a-14: sngags pa brtul zhugs mi 'dod na //
T02TD2668E:181a-15: thog mar sku gzugs cho ga bya //
T02TD2668E:181a-16: sbyan dbye cho ga byas pa la //
T02TD2668E:181a-17: brgyad 'bum cho ga bzlas par bya //
T02TD2668E:181a-18: dngos grub phran tshegs las dag ni //
T02TD2668E:181a-19: dug la stsogs pa bzhi stsogs bsgrub //
T02TD2668E:181a-20: 'di ni dngos grub rnam pa gsum //
T02TD2668E:181a-21: bsgrub pa'i cho ga gsum du bstan //
T02TD2668E:181a-22: mkhas pas byang chub sems brten cing //
T02TD2668E:181a-23: snying rje gzhan don sbyod pa dang //
T02TD2668E:181a-24: khro bo'i che ba yangs pa dag / dngos grub rnam gsum thogs med pa //
T02TD2668E:181a-25: brtul zhugs la stsogs med par 'grub //
T02TD2668E:181a-26: bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2668E:181a-27: dngos grub kyi tshul ngas par bstan pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2668E:181a-28: slob dpon don yod zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2668E:181a-30: // / sbyin sreg gi mchod pa la 'di skad do //
T02TD2668E:181a-31: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
T02TD2668E:181a-32: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2668E:181a-33: gshin rje gshed dang be ta li //
T02TD2668E:181a-34: gshin rje'i lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas //
T02TD2668E:181a-35: byang chub sems dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD2668E:181a-36: dug gsum sreg rdzas mchod par bzhes //
T02TD2668E:181a-37: bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams //
T02TD2668E:181a-38: dus 'dir grub par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2668E:181a-39: mi la sogs pa'i bdud bgegs dang //
T02TD2668E:181a-40: zhe sdang byed pa gang yang rung //
T02TD2668E:181a-41: 'phral du mod la bsgral ba dang //
T02TD2668E:181a-42: dbang po yan lag de bdag la //
T02TD2668E:181a-43: ji ltar drag rdal stangs tshul gyis //
T02TD2668E:181a-44: bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod //
T02TD2668E:181a-45: sbyin sreg gong ma dang cho ga mi gcig bris pa tsam //
T02TD2668E:181b-0: h'um thugs @181b rje dbang gi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2668E:181b-1: shes rab 'bar ba'i me byung bas //
T02TD2668E:181b-2: zhes pa la sogs brjod la btang //
T02TD2668E:181b-4: h'um 'bar ba chen po dur khrod me //
T02TD2668E:181b-5: rab tu smug cing dur khrod 'phro //
T02TD2668E:181b-6: 'jigs byed chen po khro bo'i me //
T02TD2668E:181b-7: gdug pa'i snying la 'bar bar mdzod //
T02TD2668E:181b-8: skye shi sdug bsngal rtsa ba chod //
T02TD2668E:181b-10: gong ma dang dgongs pa mi gcig pa cung zad bris pa'o//
